content: Hi everyone! We have a use case where a large amount of public information is currently published on Hugging Face, and we’re now looking to migrate at least the public metadata and README files to our institutional Dataverse instance. Has anyone here encountered a similar need before? I haven’t come across any documentation on integrating Dataverse with Hugging Face. Does anyone know if such a connection exists or if it's something that might be planned for the future? Thanks in advance!

Hi! I'm not aware of anything but you might also want to ask at https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community

If you write a script, we have a new place to put it, if you like! https://github.com/gdcc/dataverse-recipes
